views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 8 to 12

Replaces "Press home" text with "Locked ... ago"

Includes native support for:
- Arabic
- Dutch
- English (default)
- Hebrew
- Japanese
- Swedish
- Turkish
- French
- German
- Spanish
- Portuguese
- Norwegian
- Chinese

Want me to add a language? Please fill out the

If you like this tweak, please considerso I can continue to develop tweaks like this! -NeinZedd9 <3

- Adds support for iOS 11/12 (huge shoutout to level3tjg for the update!) Fixed German translation

Added native support for the following languages:
- French
- German
- Spanish
- Portuguese
- Norwegian
- Chinese

Fixed Arabic translation


Added support for iOS 9 (and lower, but untested)
Added updating every second
Added one-time donation alert after 15 unlocks
Added native support for the following languages:
- Arabic
- Dutch
- Hebrew
- Japanese
- Swedish
- Turkish
